p: Traditional medicine is attracting more interest and its use has increased over the past three decades. According to the WHO, more than 80% of African people still rely on popular medicine for their benefit care including cancer treatment [ 1]. Nowadays, many pharmaceutical agents have been discovered in medicinal plants. However, the potential of plants as sources for the production of new drugs is largely untapped [ 2]. Medicinal plants play an important role in folk medicine, and they have been described in worldwide pharmacopoeia [ 3].
